title: Promotion?
body: Hello, I am gold 1. when i reached to promo, I won 3 out of 5 , but i am still in gold 1 promo. Could you tell me what happened?

replies.body: I took a look at this for you, and it looks like there was a [queue dodge](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging).  :(  Any dodges during a series counts as a loss, which was enough to end this series.  It looks like you're back in your series now, though.  Good luck!!
Yes, I remember i missed one ready check. Thanks for helping.
